name: Blade On Fur
description:
In version 0.2 you can play in infinity arcade mod and start story mode in the demo version first level. 

Plot:

When born in royal family second son king has kicked out first son. After many years young guy has become good warrior and want revenge.

Control:

WASD - Move 

Hold Down the Left Mouse Button - Attack

Languages:

English

Minimal System requirements:

  • Win10 64bit
  • 2 cores CPU
  • ~ GT710
  • 4GB RAM
